alert.note: Alert for Yuma County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 7:47PM MST until January 09 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Blowing snow. North winds sustained at 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...In Colorado, Yuma County. In Nebraska, Dundy County. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, slow down, turn off cruise control, and exercise additional caution, particularly at intersections and highway onramps and offramps where accidents are more likely to occur The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
